nwlinkipxFrameBytesRe_SentPerSec.description: Frame Bytes Re-Sent/sec is the rate that data bytes are re-sent by the computer. This counter only counts the bytes in frames that carry data.

nwlinkipxFramesRejectedPerSec.description: Frames Rejected/sec is the rate that data frames are rejected. This counter only counts the frames (packets) that carry data.

rastotalBytesTransmitted.name: rastotalBytesTransmitted
rastotalBytesTransmitted.description: The number of bytes transmitted total for this connection.

rastotalBytesReceived.name: rastotalBytesReceived
rastotalBytesReceived.description: The number of bytes received total for this connection.

rastotalFramesTransmitted.name: rastotalFramesTransmitted
rastotalFramesTransmitted.description: The number of data frames transmitted total for this connection.

rastotalFramesReceived.name: rastotalFramesReceived
rastotalFramesReceived.description: The number of data frames received total for this connection.

rastotalPercentCompressionOut.name: rastotalPercentCompressionOut
rastotalPercentCompressionOut.description: The compression ratio for bytes being transmitted.

rastotalPercentCompressionIn.name: rastotalPercentCompressionIn
rastotalPercentCompressionIn.description: The compression ratio for bytes being received.

rastotalCRCErrors.name: rastotalCRCErrors
rastotalCRCErrors.description: The total number of CRC Errors for this connection. CRC Errors occur when the frame received contains erroneous data.

rastotalTimeoutErrors.name: rastotalTimeoutErrors
rastotalTimeoutErrors.description: The total number of Timeout Errors for this connection. Timeout Errors occur when an expected is not received in time.

rastotalSerialOverrunErrors.name: rastotalSerialOverrunErrors
rastotalSerialOverrunErrors.description: The total number of Serial Overrun Errors for this connection. Serial Overrun Errors occur when the hardware cannot handle the rate at which data is received.

rastotalAlignmentErrors.name: rastotalAlignmentErrors
rastotalAlignmentErrors.description: The total number of Alignment Errors for this connection. Alignment Errors occur when a byte received is different from the byte expected.

rastotalBufferOverrunErrors.name: rastotalBufferOverrunErrors
rastotalBufferOverrunErrors.description: The total number of Buffer Overrun Errors for this connection. Buffer Overrun Errors when the software cannot handle the rate at which data is received.

rastotalTotalErrors.name: rastotalTotalErrors
rastotalTotalErrors.description: The total number of CRC, Timeout, Serial Overrun, Alignment, and Buffer Overrun Errors for this connection.

rastotalBytesTransmittedPerSec.name: rastotalBytesTransmittedPerSec
rastotalBytesTransmittedPerSec.description: The number of bytes transmitted per second.

rastotalBytesReceivedPerSec.name: rastotalBytesReceivedPerSec
rastotalBytesReceivedPerSec.description: The number of bytes received per second.

rastotalFramesTransmittedPerSec.name: rastotalFramesTransmittedPerSec
rastotalFramesTransmittedPerSec.description: The number of frames transmitted per second.

rastotalFramesReceivedPerSec.name: rastotalFramesReceivedPerSec
rastotalFramesReceivedPerSec.description: The number of frames received per second.

rastotalTotalErrorsPerSec.name: rastotalTotalErrorsPerSec
rastotalTotalErrorsPerSec.description: The total number of CRC, Timeout, Serial Overrun, Alignment, and Buffer Overrun Errors per second.

rastotalTotalConnections.name: rastotalTotalConnections
rastotalTotalConnections.description: The total number of Remote Access connections.

serverBytesTotalPerSec.name: serverBytesTotalPerSec
serverBytesTotalPerSec.description: The number of bytes the server has sent to and received from the network. This value provides an overall indication of how busy the server is.

serverBytesReceivedPerSec.name: serverBytesReceivedPerSec
serverBytesReceivedPerSec.description: The number of bytes the server has received from the network. Indicates how busy the server is.

serverBytesTransmittedPerSec.name: serverBytesTransmittedPerSec
serverBytesTransmittedPerSec.description: The number of bytes the server has sent on the network. Indicates how busy the server is.

serverSessionsTimedOut.name: serverSessionsTimedOut
serverSessionsTimedOut.description: The number of sessions that have been closed due to their idle time exceeding the autodisconnect parameter for the server. Shows whether the autodisconnect setting is helping to conserve resources.

serverSessionsErroredOut.name: serverSessionsErroredOut
serverSessionsErroredOut.description: The number of sessions that have been closed due to unexpected error conditions. Indicates how frequently network problems are causing dropped sessions on the server.

serverSessionsLoggedOff.name: serverSessionsLoggedOff
serverSessionsLoggedOff.description: The number of sessions that have terminated normally. Useful in interpreting the Sessions Times Out and Sessions Errored Out statistics--allows percentage calculations.

serverSessionsForcedOff.name: serverSessionsForcedOff
serverSessionsForcedOff.description: The number of sessions that have been forced to logoff. Can indicate how many sessions were forced to logoff due to logon time constraints.

serverErrorsLogon.name: serverErrorsLogon
serverErrorsLogon.description: The number of failed logon attempts to the server. Can indicate whether password guessing programs are being used to crack the security on the server.

serverErrorsAccessPermissions.name: serverErrorsAccessPermissions
serverErrorsAccessPermissions.description: The number of times opens on behalf of clients have failed with STATUS_ACCESS_DENIED. Can indicate whether somebody is randomly attempting to access files in hopes of getting at something that was not properly protected.

serverErrorsGrantedAccess.name: serverErrorsGrantedAccess
serverErrorsGrantedAccess.description: The number of times accesses to files opened successfully were denied. Can indicate attempts to access files without proper access authorization.

serverErrorsSystem.name: serverErrorsSystem
serverErrorsSystem.description: The number of times an internal Server Error was detected. Unexpected errors usually indicate a problem with the Server.

serverBlockingRequestsRejected.name: serverBlockingRequestsRejected
serverBlockingRequestsRejected.description: The number of times the server has rejected blocking SMBs due to insufficient count of free work items. Indicates whether the maxworkitem or minfreeworkitems server parameters may need tuning.

serverWorkItemShortages.name: serverWorkItemShortages
serverWorkItemShortages.description: The number of times STATUS_DATA_NOT_ACCEPTED was returned at receive indication time. This occurs when no work item is available or can be allocated to service the incoming request. Indicates whether the initworkitems or maxworkitems parameters may need tuning.

serverFilesOpenedTotal.name: serverFilesOpenedTotal
serverFilesOpenedTotal.description: The number of successful open attempts performed by the server of behalf of clients. Useful in determining the amount of file I/O, determining overhead for path-based operations, determining the effectiveness of oplocks.

serverFilesOpen.name: serverFilesOpen
serverFilesOpen.description: The number of files currently opened in the server. Indicates current server activity.

serverServerSessions.name: serverServerSessions
serverServerSessions.description: The number of sessions currently active in the server. Indicates current server activity.

serverFileDirectorySearches.name: serverFileDirectorySearches
serverFileDirectorySearches.description: The number of searches for files currently active in the server. Indicates current server activity.

serverPoolNonpagedBytes.name: serverPoolNonpagedBytes
serverPoolNonpagedBytes.description: The number of bytes of non-pageable computer memory the server is currently using. Can help in determining good values for the maxnonpagedmemoryusage parameter.

serverPoolNonpagedFailures.name: serverPoolNonpagedFailures
serverPoolNonpagedFailures.description: The number of times allocations from nonpaged pool have failed. Indicates that the computer's physical memory is too small.

serverPoolNonpagedPeak.name: serverPoolNonpagedPeak
serverPoolNonpagedPeak.description: The maximum number of bytes of nonpaged pool the server has had in use at any one point. Indicates how much physical memory the computer should have.

serverPoolPagedBytes.name: serverPoolPagedBytes
serverPoolPagedBytes.description: The number of bytes of pageable computer memory the server is currently using. Can help in determining good values for the maxpagedmemoryusage parameter.

serverPoolPagedFailures.name: serverPoolPagedFailures
serverPoolPagedFailures.description: The number of times allocations from paged pool have failed. Indicates that the computer's physical memory of pagefile are too small.

serverPoolPagedPeak.name: serverPoolPagedPeak
serverPoolPagedPeak.description: The maximum number of bytes of paged pool the server has had allocated. Indicates the proper sizes of the Page File(s) and physical memory.

serverContextBlocksQueuedPerSec.name: serverContextBlocksQueuedPerSec
serverContextBlocksQueuedPerSec.description: Context Blocks Queued per second is the rate that work context blocks had to be placed on the server's FSP queue to await server action.

serverLogonPerSec.name: serverLogonPerSec
serverLogonPerSec.description: Logon/sec is the rate of all server logons

serverLogonTotal.name: serverLogonTotal
serverLogonTotal.description: Logon Total includes all interactive logons, network logons, service logons, successful logon, and failed logons since the machine is last rebooted.

srvrqueuesserver_Work_QueuesTable.name: srvrqueuesserver_Work_QueuesTable
srvrqueuesserver_Work_QueuesTable.description: A table containing performance information for instances of 'server-Work-Queues' objects.

srvrqueuesserver_Work_QueuesEntry.name: srvrqueuesserver_Work_QueuesEntry
srvrqueuesserver_Work_QueuesEntry.description: Performance information for one particular instance of 'server-Work-Queues' object.

srvrqueuesQueueLength.name: srvrqueuesQueueLength
srvrqueuesQueueLength.description: Queue Length is the current length of the server work queue for this CPU. A sustained queue length greater than four may indicate processor congestion. This is an instantaneous count, not an average over time.

srvrqueuesActiveThreads.name: srvrqueuesActiveThreads
srvrqueuesActiveThreads.description: Active Threads is the number of threads currently working on a request from the server client for this CPU. The system keeps this number as low as possible to minimize unnecessary context switching. This is an instantaneous count for the CPU, not an average over time.

srvrqueuesAvailableThreads.name: srvrqueuesAvailableThreads
srvrqueuesAvailableThreads.description: Available Threads is the number of server threads on this CPU not currently working on requests from a client. The server dynamically adjusts the number of threads to maximize server performance.

srvrqueuesAvailableWorkItems.name: srvrqueuesAvailableWorkItems
srvrqueuesAvailableWorkItems.description: Every request from a client is represented in the server as a 'work item,' and the server maintains a pool of available work items per CPU to speed processing. This is the instantaneous number of available work items for this CPU. A sustained near-zero value indicates the need to increase the MinFreeWorkItems registry value for the Server service. This value will always be 0 in the Blocking Queue instance.

srvrqueuesBorrowedWorkItems.name: srvrqueuesBorrowedWorkItems
srvrqueuesBorrowedWorkItems.description: Every request from a client is represented in the server as a 'work item,' and the server maintains a pool of available work items per CPU to speed processing. When a CPU runs out of work items, it borrows a free work item from another CPU. An increasing value of this running counter may indicate the need to increase the 'MaxWorkItems' or 'MinFreeWorkItems' registry values for the Server service. This value will always be 0 in the Blocking Queue instance.

srvrqueuesWorkItemShortages.name: srvrqueuesWorkItemShortages
srvrqueuesWorkItemShortages.description: Every request from a client is represented in the server as a 'work item,' and the server maintains a pool of available work items per CPU to speed processing. A sustained value greater than zero indicates the need to increase the 'MaxWorkItems' registry value for the Server service. This value will always be 0 in the Blocking Queue instance.

srvrqueuesCurrentClients.name: srvrqueuesCurrentClients
srvrqueuesCurrentClients.description: Current Clients is the instantaneous count of the clients being serviced by this CPU. The server actively balances the client load across all of the CPU's in the system. This value will always be 0 in the Blocking Queue instance.

srvrqueuesBytesReceivedPerSec.name: srvrqueuesBytesReceivedPerSec
srvrqueuesBytesReceivedPerSec.description: The rate at which the Server is receiving bytes from the network clients on this CPU. This value is a measure of how busy the Server is.

srvrqueuesBytesSentPerSec.name: srvrqueuesBytesSentPerSec
srvrqueuesBytesSentPerSec.description: The rate at which the Server is sending bytes to the network clients on this CPU. This value is a measure of how busy the Server is.

srvrqueuesBytesTransferredPerSec.name: srvrqueuesBytesTransferredPerSec
srvrqueuesBytesTransferredPerSec.description: The rate at which the Server is sending and receiving bytes with the network clients on this CPU. This value is a measure of how busy the Server is.

srvrqueuesReadOperationsPerSec.name: srvrqueuesReadOperationsPerSec
srvrqueuesReadOperationsPerSec.description: Read Operations/sec is the rate the server is performing file read operations for the clients on this CPU. This value is a measure of how busy the Server is. This value will always be 0 in the Blocking Queue instance.

srvrqueuesReadBytesPerSec.name: srvrqueuesReadBytesPerSec
srvrqueuesReadBytesPerSec.description: Read Bytes/sec is the rate the server is reading data from files for the clients on this CPU. This value is a measure of how busy the Server is.

srvrqueuesWriteOperationsPerSec.name: srvrqueuesWriteOperationsPerSec
srvrqueuesWriteOperationsPerSec.description: Write Operations/sec is the rate the server is performing file write operations for the clients on this CPU. This value is a measure of how busy the Server is. This value will always be 0 in the Blocking Queue instance.

srvrqueuesWriteBytesPerSec.name: srvrqueuesWriteBytesPerSec
srvrqueuesWriteBytesPerSec.description: Write Bytes/sec is the rate the server is writing data to files for the clients on this CPU. This value is a measure of how busy the Server is.

srvrqueuesTotalBytesPerSec.name: srvrqueuesTotalBytesPerSec
srvrqueuesTotalBytesPerSec.description: Total Bytes/sec is the rate the Server is reading and writing data to and from the files for the clients on this CPU. This value is a measure of how busy the Server is.

srvrqueuesTotalOperationsPerSec.name: srvrqueuesTotalOperationsPerSec
srvrqueuesTotalOperationsPerSec.description: Total Operations/sec is the rate the Server is performing file read and file write operations for the cliens on this CPU. This value is a measure of how busy the Server is. This value will always be 0 in the Blocking Queue instance.

srvrqueuesContextBlocksQueuedPerSec.name: srvrqueuesContextBlocksQueuedPerSec
srvrqueuesContextBlocksQueuedPerSec.description: Context Blocks Queued per second is the rate that work context blocks had to be placed on the server's FSP queue to await server action.

cacheDataMapsPerSec.name: cacheDataMapsPerSec
cacheDataMapsPerSec.description: Data Maps/sec is the frequency that a file system such as NTFS or HPFS maps a page of a file into the Cache to read the page.

cacheSyncDataMapsPerSec.name: cacheSyncDataMapsPerSec
cacheSyncDataMapsPerSec.description: Sync Data Maps/sec counts the frequency that a file system such as NTFS or HPFS maps a page of a file into the Cache to read the page, and wishes to wait for the Cache to retrieve the page if it is not in main memory.

cacheAsyncDataMapsPerSec.name: cacheAsyncDataMapsPerSec
cacheAsyncDataMapsPerSec.description: Async Data Maps/sec is the frequency that an application using a file system such as NTFS or HPFS to map a page of a file into the Cache to read the page, and does not wish to wait for the Cache to retrieve the page if it is not in main memory.

cacheDataMapHitsPercent.name: cacheDataMapHitsPercent
cacheDataMapHitsPercent.description: Data Map Hits is the percentage of Data Maps in the Cache that could be resolved without having to retrieve a page from the disk, i.e. the page was already in physical memory.

cacheDataMapPinsPerSec.name: cacheDataMapPinsPerSec
cacheDataMapPinsPerSec.description: Data Map Pins/sec is the frequency of Data Maps in the Cache that resulted in pinning a page in main memory, an action usually preparatory to writing to the file on disk. While pinned, a page's physical address in main memory and virtual address in the Cache will not be altered.

cachePinReadsPerSec.name: cachePinReadsPerSec
cachePinReadsPerSec.description: Pin Reads/sec is the frequency of reading data into the Cache preparatory to writing the data back to disk. Pages read in this fashion are pinned in memory at the completion of the read. While pinned, a page's physical address in the Cache will not be altered.

cacheSyncPinReadsPerSec.name: cacheSyncPinReadsPerSec
cacheSyncPinReadsPerSec.description: Sync Pin Reads/sec is the frequency of reading data into the Cache preparatory to writing the data back to disk. Pages read in this fashion are pinned in memory at the completion of the read. The file system will not regain control until the page is pinned in the Cache, in particular if the disk must be accessed to retrieve the page. While pinned, a page's physical address in the Cache will not be altered.

cacheAsyncPinReadsPerSec.name: cacheAsyncPinReadsPerSec
cacheAsyncPinReadsPerSec.description: Async Pin Reads/sec is the frequency of reading data into the Cache preparatory to writing the data back to disk. Pages read in this fashion are pinned in memory at the completion of the read. The file system will regain control immediately even if the disk must be accessed to retrieve the page. While pinned, a page's physical address will not be altered.

cachePinReadHitsPercent.name: cachePinReadHitsPercent
cachePinReadHitsPercent.description: Pin Read Hits is the percentage of Cache Pin Read requests that hit the Cache, i.e., did not require a disk read in order to provide access to the page in the Cache. While pinned, a page's physical address in the Cache will not be altered. The LAN Redirector uses this method for retrieving Cache information, as does the LAN Server for small transfers. This is usually the method used by the disk file systems as well.

cacheCopyReadsPerSec.name: cacheCopyReadsPerSec
cacheCopyReadsPerSec.description: Copy Reads/sec is the frequency of reads from Cache pages that involve a memory copy of the data from the Cache to the application's buffer. The LAN Redirector uses this method for retrieving Cache information, as does the LAN Server for small transfers. This is a method used by the disk file systems as well.

cacheSyncCopyReadsPerSec.name: cacheSyncCopyReadsPerSec
cacheSyncCopyReadsPerSec.description: Sync Copy Reads/sec is the frequency of reads from Cache pages that involve a memory copy of the data from the Cache to the application's buffer. The file system will not regain control until the copy operation is complete, even if the disk must be accessed to retrieve the page.

cacheAsyncCopyReadsPerSec.name: cacheAsyncCopyReadsPerSec
cacheAsyncCopyReadsPerSec.description: Async Copy Reads/sec is the frequency of reads from Cache pages that involve a memory copy of the data from the Cache to the application's buffer. The application will regain control immediately even if the disk must be accessed to retrieve the page.

cacheCopyReadHitsPercent.name: cacheCopyReadHitsPercent
cacheCopyReadHitsPercent.description: Copy Read Hits is the percentage of Cache Copy Read requests that hit the Cache, i.e., did not require a disk read in order to provide access to the page in the Cache. A Copy Read is a file read operation that is satisfied by a memory copy from a Cache page to the application's buffer. The LAN Redirector uses this method for retrieving Cache information, as does the LAN Server for small transfers. This is a method used by the disk file systems as well.

cacheMDLReadsPerSec.name: cacheMDLReadsPerSec
cacheMDLReadsPerSec.description: MDL Reads/sec is the frequency of reads from Cache pages that use a Memory Descriptor List (MDL) to access the data. The MDL contains the physical address of each page involved in the transfer, and thus can employ a hardware Direct Memory Access (DMA) device to effect the copy. The LAN Server uses this method for large transfers out of the server.

cacheSyncMDLReadsPerSec.name: cacheSyncMDLReadsPerSec
cacheSyncMDLReadsPerSec.description: Sync MDL Reads/sec is the frequency of reads from Cache pages that use a Memory Descriptor List (MDL) to access the pages. The MDL contains the physical address of each page in the transfer, thus permitting Direct Memory Access (DMA) of the pages. If the accessed page(s) are not in main memory, the caller will wait for the pages to fault in from the disk.

cacheAsyncMDLReadsPerSec.name: cacheAsyncMDLReadsPerSec
cacheAsyncMDLReadsPerSec.description: Async MDL Reads/sec is the frequency of reads from Cache pages using a Memory Descriptor List (MDL) to access the pages. The MDL contains the physical address of each page in the transfer, thus permitting Direct Memory Access (DMA) of the pages. If the accessed page(s) are not in main memory, the calling application program will not wait for the pages to fault in from disk.

cacheMDLReadHitsPercent.name: cacheMDLReadHitsPercent
cacheMDLReadHitsPercent.description: MDL Read Hits is the percentage of Cache Memory Descriptor List (MDL) Read requests that hit the Cache, i.e., did not require disk accesses in order to provide memory access to the page(s) in the Cache.

cacheReadAheadsPerSec.name: cacheReadAheadsPerSec
cacheReadAheadsPerSec.description: Read Aheads/sec is the frequency of Cache reads where the Cache detects sequential access to a file. The read aheads permit the data to be transferred in larger blocks than those being requested by the application, reducing the overhead per access.

cacheFastReadsPerSec.name: cacheFastReadsPerSec
cacheFastReadsPerSec.description: Fast Reads/sec is the frequency of reads from Cache pages that bypass the installed file system and retrieve the data directly from the Cache. Normally, file I/O requests invoke the appropriate file system to retrieve data from a file, but this path permits direct retrieval of Cache data without file system involvement if the data is in the Cache. Even if the data is not in the Cache, one invocation of the file system is avoided.

cacheSyncFastReadsPerSec.name: cacheSyncFastReadsPerSec
cacheSyncFastReadsPerSec.description: Sync Fast Reads/sec is the frequency of reads from Cache pages that bypass the installed file system and retrieve the data directly from the Cache. Normally, file I/O requests invoke the appropriate file system to retrieve data from a file, but this path permits direct retrieval of Cache data without file system involvement if the data is in the Cache. Even if the data is not in the Cache, one invocation of the file system is avoided. If the data is not in the Cache, the request (application program call) will wait until the data has been retrieved from disk.

cacheAsyncFastReadsPerSec.name: cacheAsyncFastReadsPerSec
cacheAsyncFastReadsPerSec.description: Async Fast Reads/sec is the frequency of reads from Cache pages that bypass the installed file system and retrieve the data directly from the Cache. Normally, file I/O requests will invoke the appropriate file system to retrieve data from a file, but this path permits direct retrieval of Cache data without file system involvement if the data is in the Cache. Even if the data is not in the Cache, one invocation of the file system is avoided. If the data is not in the Cache, the request (application program call) will not wait until the data has been retrieved from disk, but will get control immediately.

cacheFastReadResourceMissesPerSec.name: cacheFastReadResourceMissesPerSec
cacheFastReadResourceMissesPerSec.description: Fast Read Resource Misses/sec is the frequency of Cache misses necessitated by the lack of available resources to satisfy the request.

cacheFastReadNotPossiblesPerSec.name: cacheFastReadNotPossiblesPerSec
cacheFastReadNotPossiblesPerSec.description: Fast Read Not Possibles/sec is the frequency of attempts by an Application Program Interface (API) function call to bypass the file system to get at Cache data, that could not be honored without invoking the file system after all.

cacheLazyWriteFlushesPerSec.name: cacheLazyWriteFlushesPerSec
cacheLazyWriteFlushesPerSec.description: Lazy Write Flushes/sec is the frequency the Cache's Lazy Write thread has written to disk. Lazy Writing is the process of updating the disk after the page has been changed in memory, so the application making the change to the file does not have to wait for the disk write to complete before proceeding. More than one page can be transferred on each write operation.

cacheLazyWritePagesPerSec.name: cacheLazyWritePagesPerSec
cacheLazyWritePagesPerSec.description: Lazy Write Pages/sec is the frequency the Cache's Lazy Write thread has written to disk. Lazy Writing is the process of updating the disk after the page has been changed in memory, so the application making the change to the file does not have to wait for the disk write to complete before proceeding. More than one page can be transferred on a single disk write operation.

cacheDataFlushesPerSec.name: cacheDataFlushesPerSec
cacheDataFlushesPerSec.description: Data Flushes/sec is the frequency the Cache has flushed its contents to disk as the result of a request to flush or to satisfy a write-through file write request. More than one page can be transferred on each flush operation.

cacheDataFlushPagesPerSec.name: cacheDataFlushPagesPerSec
cacheDataFlushPagesPerSec.description: Data Flush Pages/sec is the number of pages the Cache has flushed to disk as a result of a request to flush or to satisfy a write-through file write request. More than one page can be transferred on each flush operation.

exchmtaAdjacentMTAAssociations.name: exchmtaAdjacentMTAAssociations
exchmtaAdjacentMTAAssociations.description: Adjacent MTA Associations is the number of open associations this MTA has to other MTAs.

exchmtaMessagesPerSec.name: exchmtaMessagesPerSec
exchmtaMessagesPerSec.description: Messages/sec is the rate that messages are processed.

exchmtaMessageBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaMessageBytesPerSec
exchmtaMessageBytesPerSec.description: Message Bytes/sec is the rate that message bytes are processed.

exchmtaFreeElements.name: exchmtaFreeElements
exchmtaFreeElements.description: Free Elements is the number of free buffer elements in the MTA pool.

exchmtaFreeHeaders.name: exchmtaFreeHeaders
exchmtaFreeHeaders.description: Free Headers is the number of free buffer headers in the MTA pool.

exchmtaAdminConnections.name: exchmtaAdminConnections
exchmtaAdminConnections.description: Admin Connections is the number of Microsoft Exchange Administrator programs connected to this MTA.

exchmtaThreadsInUse.name: exchmtaThreadsInUse
exchmtaThreadsInUse.description: Threads in Use is the number of threads in use by the MTA (does not include RPC threads). This number can be used to determine whether additional processors could be of benefit.

exchmtaWorkQueueLength.name: exchmtaWorkQueueLength
exchmtaWorkQueueLength.description: Work Queue Length is the number of outstanding messages in the Work Queue, which indicates the number of messages not yet processed to completion by the MTA.

exchmtaXAPIGateways.name: exchmtaXAPIGateways
exchmtaXAPIGateways.description: XAPI Gateways is the number of gateways connected to the MTA using the XAPI MT/OM interface. A single gateway may have multiple XAPI gateway sessions.

exchmtaXAPIClients.name: exchmtaXAPIClients
exchmtaXAPIClients.description: XAPI Clients is the number of XAPI clients connected to the MTA using the XAPI MA/OM interface. A single client may have multiple XAPI client sessions.

exchmtaDiskFileDeletesPerSec.name: exchmtaDiskFileDeletesPerSec
exchmtaDiskFileDeletesPerSec.description: Disk File Deletes/sec is the rate of disk file delete operations.

exchmtaDiskFileSyncsPerSec.name: exchmtaDiskFileSyncsPerSec
exchmtaDiskFileSyncsPerSec.description: Disk File Syncs/sec is the rate of disk file sync operations.

exchmtaDiskFileOpensPerSec.name: exchmtaDiskFileOpensPerSec
exchmtaDiskFileOpensPerSec.description: Disk File Opens/sec is the rate of disk file open operations.

exchmtaDiskFileReadsPerSec.name: exchmtaDiskFileReadsPerSec
exchmtaDiskFileReadsPerSec.description: Disk File Reads/sec is the rate of disk file read operations.

exchmtaDiskFileWritesPerSec.name: exchmtaDiskFileWritesPerSec
exchmtaDiskFileWritesPerSec.description: Disk File Writes/sec is the rate of disk file write operations.

exchmtaExDSReadCallsPerSec.name: exchmtaExDSReadCallsPerSec
exchmtaExDSReadCallsPerSec.description: ExDS Read Calls/sec is the rate of read calls to the directory service.

exchmtaXAPIReceiveBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaXAPIReceiveBytesPerSec
exchmtaXAPIReceiveBytesPerSec.description: XAPI Receive Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are received over a XAPI connection.

exchmtaXAPITransmitBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaXAPITransmitBytesPerSec
exchmtaXAPITransmitBytesPerSec.description: XAPI Transmit Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are transmitted over a XAPI connection.

exchmtaAdminInterfaceReceiveBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaAdminInterfaceReceiveBytesPerSec
exchmtaAdminInterfaceReceiveBytesPerSec.description: Admin Interface Receive Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are received over an Admin connection.

exchmtaAdminInterfaceTransmitBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaAdminInterfaceTransmitBytesPerSec
exchmtaAdminInterfaceTransmitBytesPerSec.description: Admin Interface Transmit Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are transmitted over an Admin connection.

exchmtaLANReceiveBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaLANReceiveBytesPerSec
exchmtaLANReceiveBytesPerSec.description: LAN Receive Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are received over a LAN from MTAs.

exchmtaLANTransmitBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaLANTransmitBytesPerSec
exchmtaLANTransmitBytesPerSec.description: LAN Transmit Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are transmitted over a LAN to MTAs.

exchmtaRASReceiveBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaRASReceiveBytesPerSec
exchmtaRASReceiveBytesPerSec.description: RAS Receive Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are received over a RAS connection.

exchmtaRASTransmitBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaRASTransmitBytesPerSec
exchmtaRASTransmitBytesPerSec.description: RAS Transmit Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are transmitted over a RAS connection.

exchmtaTCPPerIPReceiveBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaTCPPerIPReceiveBytesPerSec
exchmtaTCPPerIPReceiveBytesPerSec.description: TCP/IP Receive Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are received over a TCP/IP connection.

exchmtaTCPPerIPTransmitBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaTCPPerIPTransmitBytesPerSec
exchmtaTCPPerIPTransmitBytesPerSec.description: TCP/IP Transmit Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are transmitted over a TCP/IP connection.

exchmtaTP4ReceiveBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaTP4ReceiveBytesPerSec
exchmtaTP4ReceiveBytesPerSec.description: TP4 Receive Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are received over a TP4 connection.

exchmtaTP4TransmitBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaTP4TransmitBytesPerSec
exchmtaTP4TransmitBytesPerSec.description: TP4 Transmit Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are transmitted over a TP4 connection.

exchmtaX25ReceiveBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaX25ReceiveBytesPerSec
exchmtaX25ReceiveBytesPerSec.description: X.25 Receive Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are received over an X.25 connection.

exchmtaX25TransmitBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaX25TransmitBytesPerSec
exchmtaX25TransmitBytesPerSec.description: X.25 Transmit Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are transmitted over an X.25 connection.

exchmtaDeferredDeliveryMsgs.name: exchmtaDeferredDeliveryMsgs
exchmtaDeferredDeliveryMsgs.description: Deferred Delivery Msgs is the total number of deferred delivery messages currently stored in the MTA.

exchmtaTotalRecipientsQueued.name: exchmtaTotalRecipientsQueued
exchmtaTotalRecipientsQueued.description: Total Recipients Queued is the total number of recipients specified in all messages currently stored in the MTA.

exchmtaTotalSuccessfulConversions.name: exchmtaTotalSuccessfulConversions
exchmtaTotalSuccessfulConversions.description: Total Successful Conversions is the total number of messages successfully converted from one form to another since MTA initialization.

exchmtaTotalFailedConversions.name: exchmtaTotalFailedConversions
exchmtaTotalFailedConversions.description: Total Failed Conversions is the total number of messages which failed to be converted from one form to another since MTA initialization.

exchmtaTotalLoopsDetected.name: exchmtaTotalLoopsDetected
exchmtaTotalLoopsDetected.description: Total Loops Detected is the total number of messages detected to have looped since MTA initialization.

exchmtaInboundMessagesTotal.name: exchmtaInboundMessagesTotal
exchmtaInboundMessagesTotal.description: Inbound Messages Total is the total number of messages received since MTA initialization.

exchmtaOutboundMessagesTotal.name: exchmtaOutboundMessagesTotal
exchmtaOutboundMessagesTotal.description: Outbound Messages Total is the total number of messages transmitted since MTA initialization.

exchmtaInboundBytesTotal.name: exchmtaInboundBytesTotal
exchmtaInboundBytesTotal.description: Inbound Bytes Total is the total volume of message content received since MTA initialization, measured in kilobytes.

exchmtaWorkQueueBytes.name: exchmtaWorkQueueBytes
exchmtaWorkQueueBytes.description: Work Queue Bytes is the total volume of message content currently stored in the MTA, measured in kilobytes.

exchmtaOutboundBytesTotal.name: exchmtaOutboundBytesTotal
exchmtaOutboundBytesTotal.description: Outbound Bytes Total is the total volume of message content transmitted since MTA initialization, measured in kilobytes.

exchmtaTotalRecipientsInbound.name: exchmtaTotalRecipientsInbound
exchmtaTotalRecipientsInbound.description: Total Recipients Inbound is the total number of recipients specified in all messages received since MTA initialization.

exchmtaTotalRecipientsOutbound.name: exchmtaTotalRecipientsOutbound
exchmtaTotalRecipientsOutbound.description: Total Recipients Outbound is the total number of recipients specified in all messages transmitted since MTA initialization.

exchmtaconnmSExchangeMTA_ConnectionsTabl.name: exchmtaconnmSExchangeMTA_ConnectionsTable
exchmtaconnmSExchangeMTA_ConnectionsTabl.description: A table containing performance information for instances of 'mSExchangeMTA-Connections' objects.

exchmtaconnmSExchangeMTA_ConnectionsEntr.name: exchmtaconnmSExchangeMTA_ConnectionsEntry
exchmtaconnmSExchangeMTA_ConnectionsEntr.description: Performance information for one particular instance of 'mSExchangeMTA-Connections' object.

exchmtaconnAssociations.name: exchmtaconnAssociations
exchmtaconnAssociations.description: Associations is the number of associations between the MTA and the connected entity. MTAs may open multiple associations if additional transfer throughput is necessary.

exchmtaconnReceiveBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaconnReceiveBytesPerSec
exchmtaconnReceiveBytesPerSec.description: Receive Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are received from the connected entity.

exchmtaconnSendBytesPerSec.name: exchmtaconnSendBytesPerSec
exchmtaconnSendBytesPerSec.description: Send Bytes/sec is the rate that bytes are sent to the connected entity.

exchmtaconnReceiveMessagesPerSec.name: exchmtaconnReceiveMessagesPerSec
exchmtaconnReceiveMessagesPerSec.description: Receive Messages/sec is the rate that messages are received from the connected entity.

exchmtaconnSendMessagesPerSec.name: exchmtaconnSendMessagesPerSec
exchmtaconnSendMessagesPerSec.description: Send Messages/sec is the rate that messages are sent to the connected entity.

exchmtaconnQueueLength.name: exchmtaconnQueueLength
exchmtaconnQueueLength.description: Queue Length is the number of outstanding messages queued for transfer to the entity.

exchmtaconnConnectorIndex.name: exchmtaconnConnectorIndex
exchmtaconnConnectorIndex.description: Connector Index is a unique index associated with a connector entity.

exchmtaconnInboundRejectedTotal.name: exchmtaconnInboundRejectedTotal
exchmtaconnInboundRejectedTotal.description: Inbound Rejected Total is the total number of messages rejected from this entity since MTA initialization.

exchmtaconnTotalRecipientsQueued.name: exchmtaconnTotalRecipientsQueued
exchmtaconnTotalRecipientsQueued.description: Total Recipients Queued is the total number of recipients specified in all messages currently stored in this entity's queue.

exchmtaconnOldestMessageQueued.name: exchmtaconnOldestMessageQueued
exchmtaconnOldestMessageQueued.description: Oldest Message Queued is the time (secs) since the oldest message in this entity's queue was placed in the queue.

exchmtaconnCurrentInboundAssociations.name: exchmtaconnCurrentInboundAssociations
exchmtaconnCurrentInboundAssociations.description: Current Inbound Associations is the current number of inbound (remote initiated) associations with the entity.

exchmtaconnCurrentOutboundAssociations.name: exchmtaconnCurrentOutboundAssociations
exchmtaconnCurrentOutboundAssociations.description: Current Outbound Associations is the current number of outbound (locally initiated) associations with the entity.

exchmtaconnCumulativeInboundAssociations.name: exchmtaconnCumulativeInboundAssociations
exchmtaconnCumulativeInboundAssociations.description: Cumulative Inbound Associations is the total number of inbound (remote initiated) associations with the entity, since MTA initialization.

exchmtaconnCumulativeOutboundAssociation.name: exchmtaconnCumulativeOutboundAssociations
exchmtaconnCumulativeOutboundAssociation.description: Cumulative Outbound Associations is the total number of outbound (locally initiated) associations with the entity, since MTA initialization.

exchmtaconnLastInboundAssociation.name: exchmtaconnLastInboundAssociation
exchmtaconnLastInboundAssociation.description: Last Inbound Association is the time (secs) since the last time an inbound (remote initiated) association for this entity was active.

exchmtaconnLastOutboundAssociation.name: exchmtaconnLastOutboundAssociation
exchmtaconnLastOutboundAssociation.description: Last Outbound Association is the time (secs) since the last time an outbound (locally initiated) association for this entity was active.

exchmtaconnRejectedInboundAssociations.name: exchmtaconnRejectedInboundAssociations
exchmtaconnRejectedInboundAssociations.description: Rejected Inbound Associations is the total number of inbound (remote initiated) associations that have been rejected, since MTA initialization.

exchmtaconnFailedOutboundAssociations.name: exchmtaconnFailedOutboundAssociations
exchmtaconnFailedOutboundAssociations.description: Failed Outbound Associations is the total number of outbound (locally initiated) associations that have failed, since MTA initialization.

exchmtaconnNextAssociationRetry.name: exchmtaconnNextAssociationRetry
exchmtaconnNextAssociationRetry.description: Next Association Retry is the time (secs since 00:00 1st Jan 1970) when this entity is next scheduled to attempt to open an association.

exchmtaconnInboundRejectReason.name: exchmtaconnInboundRejectReason
exchmtaconnInboundRejectReason.description: Inbound Reject Reason is the reject reason code, if any, for the last association rejected from this entity.

exchmtaconnOutboundFailureReason.name: exchmtaconnOutboundFailureReason
exchmtaconnOutboundFailureReason.description: Outbound Failure Reason is the failure reason code, if any, for the last association attempt to this entity.

exchmtaconnInboundMessagesTotal.name: exchmtaconnInboundMessagesTotal
exchmtaconnInboundMessagesTotal.description: Inbound Messages Total is the total number of messages received from this entity since MTA initialization.

exchmtaconnOutboundMessagesTotal.name: exchmtaconnOutboundMessagesTotal
exchmtaconnOutboundMessagesTotal.description: Outbound Messages Total is the total number of messages transmitted to this entity since MTA initialization.

exchmtaconnInboundBytesTotal.name: exchmtaconnInboundBytesTotal
exchmtaconnInboundBytesTotal.description: Inbound Bytes Total is the total volume of message content received from this entity since MTA initialization, measured in kilobytes.

exchmtaconnQueuedBytes.name: exchmtaconnQueuedBytes
exchmtaconnQueuedBytes.description: Queued Bytes is the total volume of message content currently stored in this entity's queue, measured in kilobytes.

exchmtaconnOutboundBytesTotal.name: exchmtaconnOutboundBytesTotal
exchmtaconnOutboundBytesTotal.description: Outbound Bytes Total is the total volume of message content transmitted to this entity since MTA initialization, measured in kilobytes.

exchmtaconnTotalRecipientsInbound.name: exchmtaconnTotalRecipientsInbound
exchmtaconnTotalRecipientsInbound.description: Total Recipients Inbound is the total number of recipients specified in all messages received from this entity since MTA initialization.

exchmtaconnTotalRecipientsOutbound.name: exchmtaconnTotalRecipientsOutbound
exchmtaconnTotalRecipientsOutbound.description: Total Recipients Outbound is the total number of recipients specified in all messages transmitted to this entity since MTA initialization.

exchimcQueuedMTS_IN.name: exchimcQueuedMTS_IN
exchimcQueuedMTS_IN.description: The number of messages awaiting final delivery in MS Exchange Server

exchimcBytesQueuedMTS_IN.name: exchimcBytesQueuedMTS_IN
exchimcBytesQueuedMTS_IN.description: The size, in bytes, of the messages that have been converted from Internet Mail and are awaiting final delivery within MS Exchange Server

exchimcMessagesEnteringMTS_IN.name: exchimcMessagesEnteringMTS_IN
exchimcMessagesEnteringMTS_IN.description: The number of messages entering the MTS-IN folder after conversion from Internet Mail format per hour

exchimcQueuedMTS_OUT.name: exchimcQueuedMTS_OUT
exchimcQueuedMTS_OUT.description: The number of messages waiting to be converted to Internet Mail format

exchimcBytesQueuedMTS_OUT.name: exchimcBytesQueuedMTS_OUT
exchimcBytesQueuedMTS_OUT.description: The size, in bytes, of the messages waiting to be converted to Internet Mail format

exchimcMessagesEnteringMTS_OUT.name: exchimcMessagesEnteringMTS_OUT
exchimcMessagesEnteringMTS_OUT.description: Messages that have entered the Internet Mail Service

exchimcMessagesLeavingMTS_OUT.name: exchimcMessagesLeavingMTS_OUT
exchimcMessagesLeavingMTS_OUT.description: The number of messages entering the Outbound Queue per hour

exchimcConnectionsInbound.name: exchimcConnectionsInbound
exchimcConnectionsInbound.description: The number of current SMTP connections to the Internet Mail Service established by other SMTP hosts

exchimcConnectionsOutbound.name: exchimcConnectionsOutbound
exchimcConnectionsOutbound.description: The number of current SMTP connections the Internet Mail Service has established to other SMTP hosts

exchimcConnectionsTotalOutbound.name: exchimcConnectionsTotalOutbound
exchimcConnectionsTotalOutbound.description: The total number of successful SMTP connections that the Internet Mail Service has established since it was started

exchimcConnectionsTotalInbound.name: exchimcConnectionsTotalInbound
exchimcConnectionsTotalInbound.description: The total number of SMTP connections the Internet Mail Service has accepted from other hosts since it was started

exchimcConnectionsTotalRejected.name: exchimcConnectionsTotalRejected
exchimcConnectionsTotalRejected.description: The total number of SMTP connections that the Internet Mail Service has rejected from other hosts since it was started

exchimcConnectionsTotalFailed.name: exchimcConnectionsTotalFailed
exchimcConnectionsTotalFailed.description: The total number of SMTP connections the Internet Mail Service has attempted to other hosts that failed since it was started

exchimcQueuedOutbound.name: exchimcQueuedOutbound
exchimcQueuedOutbound.description: The number of messages from MS Exchange Server, that are queued to be delivered to the Internet

exchimcQueuedInbound.name: exchimcQueuedInbound
exchimcQueuedInbound.description: The number of messages received from the Internet destined for MS Exchange Server

exchimcNDRsTotalInbound.name: exchimcNDRsTotalInbound
exchimcNDRsTotalInbound.description: The total number of Non-delivery reports generated for inbound mail

exchimcNDRsTotalOutbound.name: exchimcNDRsTotalOutbound
exchimcNDRsTotalOutbound.description: The total number of Non-delivery reports generated for outbound mail

exchimcTotalInboundKilobytes.name: exchimcTotalInboundKilobytes
exchimcTotalInboundKilobytes.description: The total kilobytes of message data transferred into the MS Exchange Server

exchimcTotalOutboundKilobytes.name: exchimcTotalOutboundKilobytes
exchimcTotalOutboundKilobytes.description: The total kilobytes of message data transferred out of the MS Exchange Server

exchimcInboundMessagesTotal.name: exchimcInboundMessagesTotal
exchimcInboundMessagesTotal.description: The total number of Internet messages delivered into MS Exchange Server

exchimcOutboundMessagesTotal.name: exchimcOutboundMessagesTotal
exchimcOutboundMessagesTotal.description: The total number of outbound messages delivered to their destinations

exchimcInboundBytesPerHr.name: exchimcInboundBytesPerHr
exchimcInboundBytesPerHr.description: The hourly rate of bytes transferred to the MS Exchange Server

exchimcOutboundBytesPerHr.name: exchimcOutboundBytesPerHr
exchimcOutboundBytesPerHr.description: The hourly rate of bytes transferred to the Internet

exchimcInboundMessagesPerHr.name: exchimcInboundMessagesPerHr
exchimcInboundMessagesPerHr.description: The hourly rate messages are transferred to the MS Exchange server

exchimcOutboundMessagesPerHr.name: exchimcOutboundMessagesPerHr
exchimcOutboundMessagesPerHr.description: The hourly rate messages are transferred to the Internet

exchimcOutboundConnectionsPerHr.name: exchimcOutboundConnectionsPerHr
exchimcOutboundConnectionsPerHr.description: The hourly rate at which outbound connections were made

exchimcInboundConnectionsPerHr.name: exchimcInboundConnectionsPerHr
exchimcInboundConnectionsPerHr.description: The hourly rate at which inbound connections were received

exchimcTotalMessagesQueued.name: exchimcTotalMessagesQueued
exchimcTotalMessagesQueued.description: Total messages waiting in the Internet Mail Service queues

exchimcTotalKilobytesQueued.name: exchimcTotalKilobytesQueued
exchimcTotalKilobytesQueued.description: Total kilobytes of message data queued in the Internet Mail Service queues

exchimcTotalInboundRecipients.name: exchimcTotalInboundRecipients
exchimcTotalInboundRecipients.description: Total number of recipients processed inbound since the Internet Mail Service was started

exchimcTotalOutboundRecipients.name: exchimcTotalOutboundRecipients
exchimcTotalOutboundRecipients.description: Total number of recipients processed outbound since the Internet Mail Service was started

exchimcTotalRecipientsQueued.name: exchimcTotalRecipientsQueued
exchimcTotalRecipientsQueued.description: Total number of recipients in the Internet Mail Service queues

exchimcTotalSuccessfulConversions.name: exchimcTotalSuccessfulConversions
exchimcTotalSuccessfulConversions.description: Total message format conversions between internet format and Exchange format that succeeded.

exchimcTotalFailedConversions.name: exchimcTotalFailedConversions
exchimcTotalFailedConversions.description: Total message format conversions between internet format and Exchange format that failed.

exchimcTotalLoopsDetected.name: exchimcTotalLoopsDetected
exchimcTotalLoopsDetected.description: Total number of messages NDRd because they appeared to be looping infinitely.

exchisRPCPacketsPerSec.name: exchisRPCPacketsPerSec
exchisRPCPacketsPerSec.description: RPC Packets/sec is the rate that RPC packets are processed.

exchisRPCOperationsPerSec.name: exchisRPCOperationsPerSec
exchisRPCOperationsPerSec.description: RPC Operations/sec is the rate that RPC operations occur.

exchisReadBytesRPCClientsPerSec.name: exchisReadBytesRPCClientsPerSec
exchisReadBytesRPCClientsPerSec.description: Read Bytes RPC Clients/sec is the rate that bytes are read from RPC clients.

exchisWriteBytesRPCClientsPerSec.name: exchisWriteBytesRPCClientsPerSec
exchisWriteBytesRPCClientsPerSec.description: Write Bytes RPC Clients/sec is the rate that bytes are written to RPC clients.

exchisPushNotificationsGeneratedPerSec.name: exchisPushNotificationsGeneratedPerSec
exchisPushNotificationsGeneratedPerSec.description: Push Notifications Generated/sec is the rate at which notifications are being sent to clients that have registered for notifications of changes to tables in the information store.

exchisPushNotificationsSkippedPerSec.name: exchisPushNotificationsSkippedPerSec
exchisPushNotificationsSkippedPerSec.description: Push Notifications Skipped/sec is the number of push notifications that have been skipped by caching at the server.

exchisRPCRequests.name: exchisRPCRequests
exchisRPCRequests.description: RPC Requests is the number of client requests that are currently being processed by the information store.

exchisRPCRequestsPeak.name: exchisRPCRequestsPeak
exchisRPCRequestsPeak.description: RPC Requests Peak is the maximum number of client requests that were processed simultaneously by the information store since it was started.

exchisUserCount.name: exchisUserCount
exchisUserCount.description: User Count is the number of users connected to the information store.

exchisActiveUserCount.name: exchisActiveUserCount
exchisActiveUserCount.description: Number of user connections that have shown some activity in the last 10 minutes.

exchisMaximumUsers.name: exchisMaximumUsers
exchisMaximumUsers.description: Maximum Users is the maximum number of concurrent users since startup.

exchisAnonymousUserCount.name: exchisAnonymousUserCount
exchisAnonymousUserCount.description: Anonymous User Count is the number of anonymous users connected to the information store.

exchisMaximumAnonymousUsers.name: exchisMaximumAnonymousUsers
exchisMaximumAnonymousUsers.description: The maximum number of anonymous users since startup.

exchisConnectionCount.name: exchisConnectionCount
exchisConnectionCount.description: Connection Count is the number of client processes connected to the information store.

exchisActiveConnectionCount.name: exchisActiveConnectionCount
exchisActiveConnectionCount.description: Number of connections that have shown some activity in the last 10 minutes.

exchisMaximumConnections.name: exchisMaximumConnections
exchisMaximumConnections.description: The maximum number of concurrent connections since startup.

exchisPushNotificationsCacheSize.name: exchisPushNotificationsCacheSize
exchisPushNotificationsCacheSize.description: The current size of the Push Notifications Cache.

exchisPeakPushNotificationsCacheSize.name: exchisPeakPushNotificationsCacheSize
exchisPeakPushNotificationsCacheSize.description: The maximum size of the Push Notifications Cache.

exchisDatabaseSessionHitRate.name: exchisDatabaseSessionHitRate
exchisDatabaseSessionHitRate.description: Database Session Hit Rate is the percent hit rate on re-using database sessions.

exchisIMAPMessagesSent.name: exchisIMAPMessagesSent
exchisIMAPMessagesSent.description: Messages Sent to clients connected via the IMAP external network interface.

exchisIMAPCommandsIssued.name: exchisIMAPCommandsIssued
exchisIMAPCommandsIssued.description: Total number of commands issued by clients connected via the IMAP external network interface

exchisIMAPMessageSendRate.name: exchisIMAPMessageSendRate
exchisIMAPMessageSendRate.description: Rate at which messages are sent to clients connected via the IMAP external network interface.

exchisIMAPCommandsIssuedRate.name: exchisIMAPCommandsIssuedRate
exchisIMAPCommandsIssuedRate.description: Rate at which commands are issued by clients connected via the IMAP external network interface

exchisPOP3MessagesSent.name: exchisPOP3MessagesSent
exchisPOP3MessagesSent.description: Messages Sent to clients connected via the POP3 external network interface.

exchisPOP3CommandsIssued.name: exchisPOP3CommandsIssued
exchisPOP3CommandsIssued.description: Total number of commands issued by clients connected via the POP3 external network interface

exchisPOP3MessagesSendRate.name: exchisPOP3MessagesSendRate
exchisPOP3MessagesSendRate.description: Rate at which messages are sent to clients connected via the POP3 external network interface.

exchisPOP3CommandsIssuedRate.name: exchisPOP3CommandsIssuedRate
exchisPOP3CommandsIssuedRate.description: Rate at which commands are issued by clients connected via the POP3 external network interface

exchisNNTPMessagesRead.name: exchisNNTPMessagesRead
exchisNNTPMessagesRead.description: NNTP Messages Read is the the total number of messages sent from the information store to NNTP clients since service startup.

exchisNNTPMessagesPosted.name: exchisNNTPMessagesPosted
exchisNNTPMessagesPosted.description: NNTP Messages Posted is the total number of messages posted by NNTP clients into the information store since service startup.

exchisNNTPFailedPosts.name: exchisNNTPFailedPosts
exchisNNTPFailedPosts.description: NNTP Failed Posts is the total number of messages posted by NNTP clients that were rejected due to missing required headers or other errors.

exchisNewsfeedMessagesReceived.name: exchisNewsfeedMessagesReceived
exchisNewsfeedMessagesReceived.description: Newsfeed Messages Received is the total number of messages received into the information store from NNTP newsfeeds since service startup.

exchisNewsfeedInboundRejectedMessages.name: exchisNewsfeedInboundRejectedMessages
exchisNewsfeedInboundRejectedMessages.description: Newsfeed Inbound Rejected Messages is the total number of messages received in newsfeeds from other NNTP servers that have been rejected as duplicates or due to errors.

exchisNNTPCommandsIssued.name: exchisNNTPCommandsIssued
exchisNNTPCommandsIssued.description: Total number of commands issued by clients connected via the NNTP external network interface

exchisNNTPMessagesReadRate.name: exchisNNTPMessagesReadRate
exchisNNTPMessagesReadRate.description: Rate at which messages are sent to NNTP clients

exchisNNTPMessagesPostedRate.name: exchisNNTPMessagesPostedRate
exchisNNTPMessagesPostedRate.description: Rate at which NNTP messages are posted by NNTP clients

exchisNNTPFailedPostsRate.name: exchisNNTPFailedPostsRate
exchisNNTPFailedPostsRate.description: Rate at which messages posted by NNTP clients are rejected

exchisNewsfeedMessagesReceivedRate.name: exchisNewsfeedMessagesReceivedRate
exchisNewsfeedMessagesReceivedRate.description: Rate at which messages are received into the information store from NNTP newsfeeds

exchisNewsfeedInboundRejectedMessagesRat.name: exchisNewsfeedInboundRejectedMessagesRate
exchisNewsfeedInboundRejectedMessagesRat.description: Rate at which messages received in newsfeeds from other NNTP servers are rejected

exchisNNTPCommandsIssuedRate.name: exchisNNTPCommandsIssuedRate
exchisNNTPCommandsIssuedRate.description: Rate at which commands are issued by clients connected via the NNTP external network interface

exchisNewsfeedMessagesSent.name: exchisNewsfeedMessagesSent
exchisNewsfeedMessagesSent.description: Newsfeed Messages Sent is the total number of messages sent from the information store to other NNTP servers by the Internet News Service since startup.

exchisNewsfeedMessagesSentPerSec.name: exchisNewsfeedMessagesSentPerSec
exchisNewsfeedMessagesSentPerSec.description: Newsfeed Messages Sent/sec is the rate at which messages are sent from the information store to other NNTP servers by the Internet News Service.

exchisNewsfeedBytesSent.name: exchisNewsfeedBytesSent
exchisNewsfeedBytesSent.description: Newsfeed Bytes Sent is the total number of bytes sent from the information store to other NNTP servers by the Internet News Service since startup.

exchisNewsfeedBytesSentPerSec.name: exchisNewsfeedBytesSentPerSec
exchisNewsfeedBytesSentPerSec.description: Newsfeed Bytes Sent/sec is the rate data is sent from the information store to other NNTP servers by the Internet News Service.

exchisNewsfeedOutboundRejectedMessages.name: exchisNewsfeedOutboundRejectedMessages
exchisNewsfeedOutboundRejectedMessages.description: Newsfeed Outbound Rejected Messages is the total number of messages sent in newsfeeds to other NNTP servers that have been rejected as duplicates or due to errors since service startup.

exchisNNTPOutboundConnections.name: exchisNNTPOutboundConnections
exchisNNTPOutboundConnections.description: NNTP Outbound Connections is the total number of outbound TCP/IP connections to other NNTP servers that have been made by the Internet News Service for push or pull newsfeeds since startup.

exchisNNTPCurrentOutboundConnections.name: exchisNNTPCurrentOutboundConnections
exchisNNTPCurrentOutboundConnections.description: NNTP Current Outbound Connections is the current number of outbound TCP/IP connections from the Internet News Service to other NNTP servers for push or pull newsfeeds.

exchisNumberOfArticleIndexTableRowsExpir.name: exchisNumberOfArticleIndexTableRowsExpired
exchisNumberOfArticleIndexTableRowsExpir.description: Number of article index table rows expired

exchispubSendQueueSize.name: exchispubSendQueueSize
exchispubSendQueueSize.description: Send Queue Size is the number of messages in the public information store's send queue.

exchispubReceiveQueueSize.name: exchispubReceiveQueueSize
exchispubReceiveQueueSize.description: Receive Queue Size is the number of messages in the public information store's receive queue.

exchispubCategorizationCount.name: exchispubCategorizationCount
exchispubCategorizationCount.description: Categorization Count is the number of categorizations that exist in the information store. Categorizations are created when a user creates a filtered view or performs a search. When the information store must maintain an excessive number of categorizations, performance can be affected.

exchispubMessagesDelivered.name: exchispubMessagesDelivered
exchispubMessagesDelivered.description: Messages Delivered is the total number of messages delivered to all recipients since startup.

exchispubMessageRecipientsDelivered.name: exchispubMessageRecipientsDelivered
exchispubMessageRecipientsDelivered.description: Message Recipients Delivered is the total number of recipients that have received a message since startup.

exchispubMessagesSent.name: exchispubMessagesSent
exchispubMessagesSent.description: Messages Sent is the total number of messages sent to other storage providers via the message transfer agent (MTA) since startup.

exchispubMessagesSubmitted.name: exchispubMessagesSubmitted
exchispubMessagesSubmitted.description: Messages Submitted is the total number of messages submitted by clients since startup.

exchispubSingleInstanceRatio.name: exchispubSingleInstanceRatio
exchispubSingleInstanceRatio.description: Single Instance Ratio is the average number of references to each message in the public information store.

exchispubMessagesDeliveredPerMin.name: exchispubMessagesDeliveredPerMin
exchispubMessagesDeliveredPerMin.description: Messages Delivered/min is the rate that messages are delivered to all recipients.

exchispubMessageRecipientsDeliveredPerMi.name: exchispubMessageRecipientsDeliveredPerMin
exchispubMessageRecipientsDeliveredPerMi.description: Message Recipients Delivered/min is the rate that recipients receive messages.

exchispubMessagesSentPerMin.name: exchispubMessagesSentPerMin
exchispubMessagesSentPerMin.description: Messages Sent/min is the rate that messages are sent to other storage providers via the message transfter agent (MTA).

exchispubMessageSubmittedPerMin.name: exchispubMessageSubmittedPerMin
exchispubMessageSubmittedPerMin.description: Messages Submitted/min is the rate that messages are submitted by clients.

exchispubAverageTimeForDelivery.name: exchispubAverageTimeForDelivery
exchispubAverageTimeForDelivery.description: Average Time for Delivery is the average time between the submission of a message to the information store and submission to the messages transfer agent (MTA) for the last 10 messages.

exchispubAverageTimeForLocalDelivery.name: exchispubAverageTimeForLocalDelivery
exchispubAverageTimeForLocalDelivery.description: Average Time for Local Delivery is the average time between the submission of a message to the information store and the delivery to all local recipients (recipients on the same server) for the last 10 messages.

exchispubTotalSizeOfRecoverableItems.name: exchispubTotalSizeOfRecoverableItems
exchispubTotalSizeOfRecoverableItems.description: Total Size of Recoverable Items is the total size in kilobytes of items retained for Item Recovery

exchispubTotalCountOfRecoverableItems.name: exchispubTotalCountOfRecoverableItems
exchispubTotalCountOfRecoverableItems.description: Total Count of Recoverable Items is the total number of items retained for Item Recovery

exchispubReplicationMessagesSent.name: exchispubReplicationMessagesSent
exchispubReplicationMessagesSent.description: Replication Messages Sent is the total number of replication messages that have been sent to other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationFolderTreeMessagesSe.name: exchispubReplicationFolderTreeMessagesSent
exchispubReplicationFolderTreeMessagesSe.description: Replication Folder Tree Messages Sent is the number of replication messages due to public folder hierarchy changes that have been sent to other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationFolderChangesSent.name: exchispubReplicationFolderChangesSent
exchispubReplicationFolderChangesSent.description: Replication Folder Tree Messages Sent is the number of replication messages due to public folder hierarchy changes that have been sent to other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationFolderDataMessagesSe.name: exchispubReplicationFolderDataMessagesSent
exchispubReplicationFolderDataMessagesSe.description: Replication Folder Data Message Messages sent is the number of replication messages due to changes to items in public folders that have been sent to other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationMessageChangesSent.name: exchispubReplicationMessageChangesSent
exchispubReplicationMessageChangesSent.description: Replication Message Changes Sent is the number of changes to items in public folders that have been replicated to other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationStatusMessagesSent.name: exchispubReplicationStatusMessagesSent
exchispubReplicationStatusMessagesSent.description: Replication Status Messages Sent is the number of replication status request or response messages that have been sent to other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationBackfillRequestsSent.name: exchispubReplicationBackfillRequestsSent
exchispubReplicationBackfillRequestsSent.description: Replication Backfill Requests Sent is the number of backfill request replication messages that have been sent to other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationBackfillDataMessages.name: exchispubReplicationBackfillDataMessagesSent
exchispubReplicationBackfillDataMessages.description: Replication Backfill Data Messages Sent is the number of replication messages sent in response to backfill requests from other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationMessagesReceived.name: exchispubReplicationMessagesReceived
exchispubReplicationMessagesReceived.description: Replication Messages Received is the total number of replication messages received from other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationFolderTreeMessagesRe.name: exchispubReplicationFolderTreeMessagesReceived
exchispubReplicationFolderTreeMessagesRe.description: Replication Folder Tree Messages Received is the number of replication messages due to public folder hierarchy changes that have been received from other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationFolderChangesReceive.name: exchispubReplicationFolderChangesReceived
exchispubReplicationFolderChangesReceive.description: Replication Folder Changes Received is the number of folder changes that have been replicated from other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationFolderDataMessagesRe.name: exchispubReplicationFolderDataMessagesReceived
exchispubReplicationFolderDataMessagesRe.description: Replication Folder Data Messages Received is the number of replication messages due to changes to items in public folders that have been received from other service since service startup.

exchispubReplicationMessageChangesReceiv.name: exchispubReplicationMessageChangesReceived
exchispubReplicationMessageChangesReceiv.description: Replication Message Changes Received is the number of changes to items in public folders that have been received from other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationStatusMessagesReceiv.name: exchispubReplicationStatusMessagesReceived
exchispubReplicationStatusMessagesReceiv.description: Status Messages Received is the number of replication status request or response messages that have been received from other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationBackfillRequestsRece.name: exchispubReplicationBackfillRequestsReceived
exchispubReplicationBackfillRequestsRece.description: Replication Backfill Requests Received is the number of backfill request replication messages that have been received from other servers since service startup.

exchispubReplicationBackfillDataMessages.name: exchispubReplicationBackfillDataMessagesReceived
exchispubReplicationBackfillDataMessages.description: Replication Backfill Data Messages Received is the number of replication messages received from other servers in response to backfill requests since service startup.

exchispubReplicationReceiveQueueSize.name: exchispubReplicationReceiveQueueSize
exchispubReplicationReceiveQueueSize.description: Replication Receive Queue Size is the number of replication messages waiting to be processed.

exchispubNumberOfMessagesExpiredFromPubl.name: exchispubNumberOfMessagesExpiredFromPublicFolders
exchispubNumberOfMessagesExpiredFromPubl.description: Number of messages expired from public folders

exchispubClientLogons.name: exchispubClientLogons
exchispubClientLogons.description: Client Logons is the number of clients (including system processes) currently logged on.

exchispubActiveClientLogons.name: exchispubActiveClientLogons
exchispubActiveClientLogons.description: Active Client Logons is the number of clients that performed any action within the last ten minute time interval.

exchispubPeakClientLogons.name: exchispubPeakClientLogons
exchispubPeakClientLogons.description: Peak Client Logons is the maximum number of concurrent client logons since service startup.

exchispubFolderOpensPerSec.name: exchispubFolderOpensPerSec
exchispubFolderOpensPerSec.description: Folder opens/sec is the rate that requests to open folders are submitted to the information store.

exchispubMessageOpensPerSec.name: exchispubMessageOpensPerSec
exchispubMessageOpensPerSec.description: Message Opens/sec is the rate that requests to open messages are submitted to the information store.

exchisprivSendQueueSize.name: exchisprivSendQueueSize
exchisprivSendQueueSize.description: Send Queue Size is the number of messages in the private information store's send queue.

exchisprivReceiveQueueSize.name: exchisprivReceiveQueueSize
exchisprivReceiveQueueSize.description: Receive Queue Size is the number of messages in the private information store's receive queue.

exchisprivCategorizationCount.name: exchisprivCategorizationCount
exchisprivCategorizationCount.description: Categorization Count is the number of categorizations that exist in the private information store. Categorizations are created when a user creates a filtered view or performs a search. When the information store must maintain an excessive number of categorizations, performance can be affected.

exchisprivMessagesDelivered.name: exchisprivMessagesDelivered
exchisprivMessagesDelivered.description: Messages Delivered is the total number of messages delivered to all recipients since startup.

exchisprivMessageRecipientsDelivered.name: exchisprivMessageRecipientsDelivered
exchisprivMessageRecipientsDelivered.description: Message Recipients Delivered is the total number of recipients that have received a message since startup.

exchisprivMessagesSent.name: exchisprivMessagesSent
exchisprivMessagesSent.description: Messages Sent is the total number of messages sent to other storage providers via the message transfter agent (MTA) since startup.

exchisprivMessagesSubmitted.name: exchisprivMessagesSubmitted
exchisprivMessagesSubmitted.description: Messages Submitted is the total number of messages submitted by clients since service startup.

exchisprivSingleInstanceRatio.name: exchisprivSingleInstanceRatio
exchisprivSingleInstanceRatio.description: Single Instance Ratio is the average number of references to each message in the private information store.

exchisprivMessagesDeliveredPerMin.name: exchisprivMessagesDeliveredPerMin
exchisprivMessagesDeliveredPerMin.description: Messages Delivered/min is the rate that messages are delivered to all recipients.

exchisprivMessageRecipientsDeliveredPerM.name: exchisprivMessageRecipientsDeliveredPerMin
exchisprivMessageRecipientsDeliveredPerM.description: Message Recipients Delivered/min is the rate that recipients receive messages.

exchisprivMessagesSentPerMin.name: exchisprivMessagesSentPerMin
exchisprivMessagesSentPerMin.description: Messages Sent/min is the rate that messages are sent to other storage providers via the message transfter agent (MTA).

exchisprivMessagesSubmittedPerMin.name: exchisprivMessagesSubmittedPerMin
exchisprivMessagesSubmittedPerMin.description: Messages Submitted/min is the rate that messages are submitted by clients.

exchisprivAverageDeliveryTime.name: exchisprivAverageDeliveryTime
exchisprivAverageDeliveryTime.description: Average Delivery Time is the average time between the submission of a message to the information store and submission to the message transfer agent (MTA) for the last 10 messages.

exchisprivAverageLocalDeliveryTime.name: exchisprivAverageLocalDeliveryTime
exchisprivAverageLocalDeliveryTime.description: Average Local Delivery Time is the average time between the submission of a message to the information store and the delivery to all local recipients (recipients on the same server) for the last 10 messages.

exchisprivTotalSizeOfRecoverableItems.name: exchisprivTotalSizeOfRecoverableItems
exchisprivTotalSizeOfRecoverableItems.description: Total Size of Recoverable Items is the total size in kilobytes of items retained for Item Recovery

exchisprivTotalCountOfRecoverableItems.name: exchisprivTotalCountOfRecoverableItems
exchisprivTotalCountOfRecoverableItems.description: Total Count of Recoverable Items is the total number of items retained for Item Recovery

exchisprivClientLogons.name: exchisprivClientLogons
exchisprivClientLogons.description: Client Logons is the number of clients (including system processes) currently logged on.

exchisprivActiveClientLogons.name: exchisprivActiveClientLogons
exchisprivActiveClientLogons.description: Active Client Logons is the number of clients that performed any action within the last ten minute time interval.

exchisprivPeakClientLogons.name: exchisprivPeakClientLogons
exchisprivPeakClientLogons.description: Peak Client Logons is the maximum number of concurrent client logons since the service started.

exchisprivLocalDeliveries.name: exchisprivLocalDeliveries
exchisprivLocalDeliveries.description: Total number of messages delivered locally

exchisprivLocalDeliveryRate.name: exchisprivLocalDeliveryRate
exchisprivLocalDeliveryRate.description: Rate at which messages are delivered locally

exchisprivFolderOpensPerSec.name: exchisprivFolderOpensPerSec
exchisprivFolderOpensPerSec.description: Folder Opens/sec is the rate that requests to open folders are submitted to the information store.

exchisprivMessageOpensPerSec.name: exchisprivMessageOpensPerSec
exchisprivMessageOpensPerSec.description: Message Opens/sec is the rate that requests to open messages are submitted to the information store.

exchdsAccessViolations.name: exchdsAccessViolations
exchdsAccessViolations.description: Access Violations is the number of times that directory service write operations were refused for security reasons.

exchdsABBrowsesPerSec.name: exchdsABBrowsesPerSec
exchdsABBrowsesPerSec.description: AB Browses/sec is the rate at which Address Book clients perform browse operations.

exchdsABReadsPerSec.name: exchdsABReadsPerSec
exchdsABReadsPerSec.description: AB Reads/sec is the rate at which Address Book clients perform read operations.

exchdsExDSReadsPerSec.name: exchdsExDSReadsPerSec
exchdsExDSReadsPerSec.description: ExDS Reads/sec is the rate at which Extended Directory Service clients perform read operations.

exchdsReplicationUpdatesPerSec.name: exchdsReplicationUpdatesPerSec
exchdsReplicationUpdatesPerSec.description: Replication Updates/sec is the rate at which replication updates are applied by the local directory service. This indicates how much replication activity is occuring on the server.

exchdsThreadsInUse.name: exchdsThreadsInUse
exchdsThreadsInUse.description: Threads in Use is the current number of threads in use by the directory service (different than the number of threads in the directory service process). Threads in Use is the number of RPC-generated threads currently in API calls and can be used to indicate whether additional processors could be of benefit.

exchdsABWritesPerSec.name: exchdsABWritesPerSec
exchdsABWritesPerSec.description: AB Writes/sec is the rate at which Address Book clients perform write operations.

exchdsExDSWritesPerSec.name: exchdsExDSWritesPerSec
exchdsExDSWritesPerSec.description: ExDS Writes/sec is the rate at which Extended Directory Service clients perform write operations.

exchdsExDSClientSessions.name: exchdsExDSClientSessions
exchdsExDSClientSessions.description: ExDS Client Sessions is the number of connected Extended Directory Service client sessions. This indicates the number of connections from other Microsoft Exchange services and the Microsoft Exchange Administrator program.

exchdsABClientSessions.name: exchdsABClientSessions
exchdsABClientSessions.description: AB Client Sessions is the number of connected Address Book client sessions.

exchdsPendingReplicationSynchronizations.name: exchdsPendingReplicationSynchronizations
exchdsPendingReplicationSynchronizations.description: Pending Replication Synchronizations is the number of directory synchronizations that are queued for this server but not yet processed.

exchdsRemainingReplicationUpdates.name: exchdsRemainingReplicationUpdates
exchdsRemainingReplicationUpdates.description: Remaining Replication Updates is the number of object modifications received in the current directory replication update packet that have not yet been applied to the local server.

exchdsObjectsReplicatedOutPerSec.name: exchdsObjectsReplicatedOutPerSec
exchdsObjectsReplicatedOutPerSec.description: This is the number of objects replicated out per second from this machine to other Directory Servers.

exchdsAddressBookViewReadsPerSec.name: exchdsAddressBookViewReadsPerSec
exchdsAddressBookViewReadsPerSec.description: Number of directory objects read per second by the View Consistency Checker.

exchdsAddressBookViewWritesPerSec.name: exchdsAddressBookViewWritesPerSec
exchdsAddressBookViewWritesPerSec.description: Number of Address Book View containers created per second by the View Consistency Checker.

exchdsAddressBookViewModifiesPerSec.name: exchdsAddressBookViewModifiesPerSec
exchdsAddressBookViewModifiesPerSec.description: Number of directory objects modified per second by the View Consistency Checker.

exchdsLDAPSearches.name: exchdsLDAPSearches
exchdsLDAPSearches.description: Total number of LDAP searches performed since the DSA started.

exchdsLDAPSearchesPerSec.name: exchdsLDAPSearchesPerSec
exchdsLDAPSearchesPerSec.description: LDAP Searches/sec is the rate at which LDAP clients perform search operations.

webproxysrvrUpstreamBytesSentPerSec.name: webproxysrvrUpstreamBytesSentPerSec
webproxysrvrUpstreamBytesSentPerSec.description: Upstream Bytes Sent/sec is the rate at which data bytes are sent by the Web Proxy Server to remote servers on the Internet or to a chained Web Proxy Server.

webproxysrvrUpstreamBytesReceivedPerSec.name: webproxysrvrUpstreamBytesReceivedPerSec
webproxysrvrUpstreamBytesReceivedPerSec.description: Upstream Bytes Received/sec is the rate at which data bytes are received by the Web Proxy Server from remote servers on the Internet or from a chained Web Proxy Server in response to requests from this Proxy.

webproxysrvrUpstreamBytesTotalPerSec.name: webproxysrvrUpstreamBytesTotalPerSec
webproxysrvrUpstreamBytesTotalPerSec.description: Upstream Bytes Total/sec is the sum of Inet Bytes Sent/sec and Bytes Received/sec. This is the total rate for all bytes transferred between the Proxy Server and remote servers on the Internet or a chained Web Proxy Server.

webproxysrvrClientBytesSentPerSec.name: webproxysrvrClientBytesSentPerSec
webproxysrvrClientBytesSentPerSec.description: Client Bytes Sent/sec is the rate at which data bytes are sent by the Web Proxy Server to Web Proxy clients.

webproxysrvrClientBytesReceivedPerSec.name: webproxysrvrClientBytesReceivedPerSec
webproxysrvrClientBytesReceivedPerSec.description: Client Bytes Received/sec is the rate at which data bytes are received by the Web Proxy Server from Web Proxy clients.

webproxysrvrClientBytesTotalPerSec.name: webproxysrvrClientBytesTotalPerSec
webproxysrvrClientBytesTotalPerSec.description: Client Bytes Total/sec is the sum of Client Bytes Sent/sec and Bytes Received/sec. This is the total rate for all bytes transferred between the Web Proxy Server and Web Proxy clients.

webproxysrvrSSLClientBytesSentPerSec.name: webproxysrvrSSLClientBytesSentPerSec
webproxysrvrSSLClientBytesSentPerSec.description: SSL Client Bytes Sent/sec is the rate at which Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) data bytes are sent by the Web Proxy Server to secured Web Proxy clients.

webproxysrvrSSLClientBytesReceivedPerSec.name: webproxysrvrSSLClientBytesReceivedPerSec
webproxysrvrSSLClientBytesReceivedPerSec.description: SSL Client Bytes Received/sec is the rate at which Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) data bytes are received by the Web Proxy Server from secured Web Proxy clients.

webproxysrvrSSLClientBytesTotalPerSec.name: webproxysrvrSSLClientBytesTotalPerSec
